case.state: What a pleasant surprise. Who would've thought that there would be another T-Doll here tonight?
I'm looking for only the most exciting games. You'll be able to satisfy me, won't you?
Games like these are only exciting when you're pushed to the brink. You'll bring me to the edge, right?
Close fights are the biggest thrill. Make sure you keep up with me, okay?
I guess this really will be a thrilling game if the Stony Cat of Team 404 is here. Try to keep pace with me, okay?
My model name's a bit of a mouthful, isn't it? You can all call me "Florence", if you'd like.
"Florence" is a pretty cute name, right? Why don't you call me that instead of "PA-15"?
Don't worry about calling me by my full name. I used to be called "Florence", so call me that if you'd like.

state.text: Did you just--

case.state: Should I lose on purpose..? I really shouldn't.
Let's keep this one and see where we go.
Let's... not intentionally throw this hand.
Should I discard five..? It'd be more interesting...
Let's spin the wheel again. Five cards!
Why play safe when you can have some fun?
Surprise me. No, really!
Games of chance are always so exciting...
Give me something good. Or don't, even.
I love not knowing what lies in store.
Let the cards fall where they may.
I wonder what I'll get.
My gut feeling says...
No more playing. I'll take ~cards.text~.
~cards~ would be perfect.
I can't be playing around anymore.
I think I'll take... ~cards.text~.
Having an unbeatable hand kinda takes the fun out of it all. That is, unless you have an incredible upset waiting for me?
This hand is definitely a winner... or is it? Doesn't the suspense just get your heart racing?
You won't be able to surprise me when my hand is like this, but that just makes it more exciting if you actually do.
They say there's no such thing as a sure win in poker. Prove it to me here.
It'd be real unexpected to lose here. Do your best, okay?
They say you shouldn't get too complacent when your victory is assured. Whoever said that clearly doesn't know how to have fun.
I've been told before that my hubris will be my downfall. That person has yet to be proven right.
Sangvis haven't taken me down with guns and rockets yet. You think you can do better with a set of playing cards?
Too many hands like these are really going to kill my excitement. Can you help me out here, ~player~?
It's not really about winning. It's winning despite the odds that I'm interested in.
It's not exactly fun if I can say with confidence that I'm going to win.
Don't confuse a winning hand with an exciting hand. You can have one without the other, you know?
I'm not a fan of obvious outcomes. I want to be caught by surprise!
Ah, whatever. I can appreciate a good hand every now and then.
Well, with enough bad hands, something like this was bound to happen eventually.
Safe for another round, huh...
This might be a dull hand, but holding on in this state is exciting in its own way.
I don't have the breathing room for bad hands right now, so I can appreciate this.
This'll definitely keep my high going for another round.
Even I'd have trouble overcoming odds like these.
We're at the point where even I can appreciate a bit of certainty.
If you're hoping for me to lose this round, well.. maybe next round.
There are no guarantees in poker - that's what makes it interesting.
Sometimes, you roll the dice and things just come up better than you were expecting.
Hmm? ~Player~, do you want to know about my hand? Let's just say that it's... okay.
Ooh, these hands are kind of exciting. You can never know just how they're going to play out.
Oh, what do you know? Looks like I stumbled upon a decent hand.
Hey, ~player~, have you looked at your hand yet? Neither have I. Wanna swap?
"Look at your hand"? Where's the fun in that?
I don't need any strategy for a game like this. It's more exciting purely riding on luck alone.
I've seen good things go bad, and bad things turn good. What are we going to see this round?

state.text: I hope you weren't expecting me to always be a pushover. I'm not the type of girl who goes down easily.

case.state: You win some, you lose some... but I'm in the mood to win this time.
Oh, finally! A real interesting hand has arrived.
I'm not throwing hands anymore. You better be ready to fight for your wins.
You want to see more of me, ~player~? I could give you a little peek, if you want... just kidding.
I'm the kind of T-Doll who would stake everything on a coin flip. A sure thing just isn't for me.
Yeah... this hand is just how I like it.
Let's let the cards fall where they may.
No idea whether you're going to win or lose... this is the kinda thrill I'm looking for.
I've got a feeling that something interesting's coming out of this hand.
Oh, I'm real excited to see how this one plays out.
I get dealt bad hands all the time. Something like this? I'm used to it.
Ahaha, jeez. Look at the mess I've gotten myself into.
Oh, you're going to love this hand, ~player~. It'll really bring the best out of me... and the me out of these clothes.
Making moves with favorable odds would have been the right play. It also would have been the boring play.
Could I have spent more time thinking about what cards to swap? Yes. Would I do something like that? I'm sure you can guess the answer to that.
Oh hello there. Yeah, this hand is as awful as I thought it was going to be.
The real fun comes from fighting your way out of hands like these.
Are you excited to see me laid bare, ~player~? If I keep getting hands like these, you won't have to wait for too long at all.
Phew. Haven't been in trouble like this since that last recon mission I was on.
Rough hand. Still, better odds to survive now than some of the deep infiltration missions I've ran.

state.text: Oh? ~Player~, you really think swapping those cards are going to help you? He~eh.

case.state: Ahaha. Well, at least I know that I can put together a bad hand whenever I want.
You're not going to get many chances to take me down, ~player~. Are you going to take advantage of me now that I'm weak?
I aim to please, ~player~, and I think this hand is going to be very pleasing for you.
You know, I should have expected this kind of hand after swapping cards randomly.
What, were you expecting that I'd use my supercomputer AI to pull up good hands? That'd be way too boring.
There's no way I should win with a hand like this, so watch me do it anyway.
I'm sure I can find a way to squeeze a win out of this hand.
Ready for something spectacular? Maybe even in the way you're expecting...
You want me to keep peeling off these layers? Maybe this round, you'll get what you want.
Sometimes when you're dealt a bad hand, you just have to wing it. Worked out for me on my last demo op.
Getting hands like these this late in the game really puts you on edge.
I'm not going to last long with hands like this... in more ways than one.
Come on! Let's keep these good times rolling!
This one could be the end..!
Is this the hand that ends my rush? Or is it just more fuel for the fire?
Someone else would hate hands like this, but I wouldn't have it any other way.
I could lose at any moment. Do you know how exciting that is to me?
How anyone could be calm in a position like this is a mystery to me.

state.text: Adventures? Well, I had a deep infiltration mission that went wrong recently. As you can probably guess, I made it through just fine though.

case.state: What, dreams? Why bother dreaming when you can go out and just do things? Better to enjoy what you can do than dream about things you haven't done.
Oh, Sangvis Ferri are nasty, alright. Luckily, they don't have much of a planet left to glass-- humanity kinda did that to themselves already.
A battlecruiser? No way. I'm more of an anti-personnel kinda girl. I leave the big boys to the HOCs... but I'll take you on anytime, ~jim~.
A secret, that's it? How about we up the stakes a little? If you're naked first, then I'll keep your clothes after the game. And if I'm naked first, then I'll do anything you want.

state.text: Yeah, you definitely got me. I hope you've got a couple more tricks up your sleeves, because now you've really got my attention.

case.state: "Little" lies? Why stop at a "little" lie? It's a lot more exciting try to keep up a huge web of deceit, don't you think?

state.text: There's T-Dolls who take their "families" very seriously, but I'm not one of them. Honestly, the other girls in that "family" probably don't take it that seriously either.

case.state: That's a lot, if we're talking post-war money... oh! I could probably get an amusement park running with that kind of money.
Alright, I see what kind of game you want to play, princess. You really know how to make a girl work hard for what she wants, huh?
They didn't ask me for my name when I was hot off the production line, and something tells me you weren't asked to name yourself either.
Ah, ma chérie! Enchantée! What's a cute little Frenchwoman like you doing here?
I can't say that there are many familial bonds to make with a system of conveyor belts and mechanical hands...
Alright, alright, I get it. Look, if you're going to be so adamant about it, then you can call me "Fleur" or something.
There was one time where I was being pinned down by a Sangvis leader, alone and out of supplies... until 404 decided to airdrop in and "save" me. Real buzzkill.
Now that I'm unarmed, it'd be real exciting if Sangvis attacked out of the blue, don't you think?
Oh, would you look at that! It looks like little ~tomoko~ over here has found her voice!
...Please don't call me that, Orendi.

state.text: I don't know what a "mobile fortress destroyer" is, but the few ARES I've helped take down probably have the firepower to take out a country, let alone a fortress.

case.state: I didn't know you had these kind of interests, Commander. But seeking stimulation isn't a bad thing, you know?
Mmm, classy. This place is a lot nicer than the bombed out ruins, mortar ditches and abandoned cities I usually spend my time around.
There's a bar here? If it weren't for the whole "T-Dolls can't get intoxicated" thing I'd have already ordered something by now.
I haven't seen a beach with clean water like this in... well, ever, really. Radioactive fallout tends to turn water kind of murky.
I have a cute outfit that'd fit perfectly with this kind of room... too bad I didn't come wearing it.
Can you imagine, going about your day when suddenly you look up to see a cutie on the rooftop showing off her body to the world? Doesn't the thought just get you excited?
It'd be a waste if we didn't enter the water at some point, so let's go in after this. Sure, I don't have a swimsuit, but I never use one anyway.
Whew, it's pretty hot in here... what, are you surprised that an android can feel temperatures? T-Dolls are pretty advanced nowadays.
Wow, isn't this place fancy? Hey, I heard that rich people usually have some... interesting things hidden in the basement. Why don't we do some exploring later?
Well, now isn't this an interesting room? Plenty of dark corners where no-one would ever see you... sounds like it could be fun.

Oh, you didn't tell me there'd be a crowd waiting for us!
Huh? No, I'm not complaining, it's the opposite, actually...

Ooh, cozy. Nice bedroom... is it yours, ~player~?
Oh, look, I found your porn collection! Aha. I was kidding, no need to look so horrified.
You can have all kinds of fun in a locker room, especially if you're trying to stay hidden... but sometimes it's more fun to get caught in the act.
Wow, we're really high up, aren't we? High up enough that you could be completely naked against the screen, and no-one would ever realise, mmm...

I may not look like it, but I read plenty of books myself. Horror, thrillers... and the kind of books that show off all the different things that ~human.ifMale(a man and a woman|two women)~ can do together.
This place is kind of filthy... I'm all for kinky things in interesting places, but... even I have standards.

A place like this really gets your heart racing, doesn't it?
Oh, you better not look behind you, ~player~...

All these hearts are kinda cheesy, don't you think?
What? Don't look at me like that.
You're looking a little nostalgic, ~player~. I didn't pin you for a strip poker regular, but I guess looks can be decieving.
The armoury at the base is the perfect place for some more... exciting activities. It's usually quiet, but you can never know when someone'll come through the doors...
Out in the hall, huh? Mmm, a perfect place for punishing some naughty girls... Hey, ~human.ifMale(Mister|Miss)~ ~player~, have I been a bad girl?
It's a strange sight looking at an intact brick wall. I'm a lot more used to rubble and ruins, myself.
Outside, in the dark, soon to be completely naked... yup, just another ~weekday~ night for me.
Ah, Christmas. Isn't it an exciting day? The festive atmosphere really lowers people's inhibitions, so there's always opportunities for something exciting to happen.
Ooh, a bathhouse. Hey, why don't we take a dip later on? Oh, there's no need to worry about me short-circuiting. T-Dolls have been waterproof for years now.
There are showers here? Great. I can already tell I might not be in the cleanest state once we're all done here.
A green screen? That's some pretty old technology. They don't have holo-projectors here or anything?
Woah, an arcade? How old school. Oh, look, ~player~, a light gun game! I'm pretty good at those, you know? Let's play later!
They're really getting into it back there, huh. Maybe I'll join in later on... there's nothing quite like getting tangled up with a bunch of like-minded people.
I bet you wonder why I'm called PA-15 and Florence, right? Well, civilians prefer human names for androids, while the military would rather us let go of the past.
Normally you'd be ecstatic about a hand like this, but certainty is no fun.
Are you expecting little ol' me to take care of all these hunks? Well, it looks like I'm in for a lo~ong night.
Plenty of cuties here to play with to~background.time~. Great choices, ~player~.
What, are you having a hard time? Need a bit of help? Alright, I'll ease up a bit.

state.text: Aww, jeez, I can't hold back anymore. Someone, anyone, please finish me off!

case.state: Y'know, I wasn't always a gun for hire. Back when I was Florence, I spent my time... actually, what do you all think my job was before joining a PMC?
This is really coming down to the wire. Games on the edge like this are where I really shine, though.
Last hand, ~last_hand~. Time to put everything on the line.
Oh, by the way - that whole "giving away how good my hand is" thing that we've been doing? Can I stop doing that now?
Surely, you don't need that whole "giving away how good my hand is" thing to beat me, right?
It's just you and me, ~final~. Do you think you've got what it takes to bring me down?
If you're thinking to yourself "those boobs must be fake", well, I don't know what you were expecting from an android.
Like I said, I'm not giving away anything anymore.
I'll be keeping this hand a secret for now.
This could be a royal flush, for all you know. But is it actually?
Sorry for turning the difficulty up on you all, but I have to make this game fun in my own way.
Don't misunderstand me - I'm not in this game to lose or anything.
You should learn to appreciate a bit of mystery more.
So? What do you think about my poker face?
Things get a little harder when I'm not dropping hints about my hand, don't they?
Didn't anyone think it was weird that everyone here is so easy to read? Just me?
What, you want to know what kind of hand I have, ~player~? You'll find out soon enough.
~Player~, you can stare all you want, but my lips are sealed.
You want to know what my hand is, ~player~? I'll let you know later.
Aww, don't make that face, ~player~. Isn't it exciting not knowing what's going to happen?
It's a lot more risky to choose a hand when you don't know what you're up against, isn't it, ~player~?
Hey, ~player~~. Do I have a good hand? Do I have a bad hand? How are you going to play out this round?
Come on now, ~player~! Isn't it more fun when you don't know about what's in my hand?
Don't be like that, 416. Aren't you the one who's always talking about setting up the groundwork before beginning an operation?
Ah, 416, you're so cold! Aren't you the one who is always talking about how "perfect preparation allows for perfect execution"?
Ugh, you and your "well-laid" plans, 416. What are you going to do when things don't go to plan, huh?
Aww, come on, Revy. You should understand that once you've used a gun for long enough, you could never see yourself using anything different.
When you're good enough at what you do, Meia, you find ways to get things done without needing to be all stiff about it. That's what makes me a real pro.
Oh, you know Cal? We go way back, but she's not actually my sister, or my mom... I can't figure out why people keep saying that...

state.text: Another win goes to me, pocket rocket.
Oh, that? Well, it's because you're both small and... uh... dynamic.
No, not really. I prefer to take things slowly and savour the moment.
Small? Nope. It's just form-fitting. I love the tight embrace of a slim outfit.
A gun? I think you've got something wrong, pocket rocket. I'm a T-Doll who uses a gun. An android.

case.state: Yup. Looks like this is my victory, pocket rocket.
Looks like I'll be first out of the gate, pocket rocket.
Ooh, ouch. Here I was, trying to help a gloomy girl come out of her shell, and she goes off and barks at me for it.

Ooh, "Flo", huh? I like that name. It's cute.
And you were right the second time around, I'm an android.
"Emotionless"? I might not wear my heart on my sleeve, but I wouldn't say that I'm emotionless. As for "super assassin", well... heh.
Some people would say my specialty is getting into trouble, but I'm still up and kicking, right? So I'd rather say it's getting out of trouble.
Right? You don't need a big gun to do big damage. Clean shots to vital parts will put down any combat platform, be it a Sangvis unit or a KCCO mech.
What can I say? When you look like I do, you have plenty of reasons to be confident.
I wouldn't go that far, Megumin, but I can't get enough of 'em. Nothing beats downing a Goliath and watching it wreak havoc across a battlefield.
These "things" are receivers. Wouldn't want to miss a call from the Commander-- ah.
Hey, you know what? My name might be Florence, but "Fifteen" doesn't sound half bad. Just drop the "Ms" bit.
Well, I could say the same for you, Megumin. I bet your outfit turns heads just as much as mine does.
Oh, I don't know about that. I can't imagine that I'm not as exciting as some holy woman.
Crazily enough, I am. It's sort of an unspoken rule between T-Dolls to celebrate the end of a battle by looking cool.
Oh? It seems like you have a good eye, Megumin. I'm all about going in fast and hard.
And here I thought you'd never ask... although, "exploding grounds" is a really strange way to talk about a firing range...
It's nothing new to me, Megumin. Each loss is just bringing me closer to my element.
Racing? No, not really... but if you're talking about racy things, then that's an entirely different story.
Of course you wouldn't have expected it. It's not even a dress.
Uh, wait, what? A game?
A backpack? No, this is a-
Aw, come on. Were you really feeling threatened by little old me, Nami?
A machine? Well, yeah. But I prefer to be called an "android" or a T-Doll. Feels more human than "machine".
Not "robot", but "T-Doll", Ribbons. Not that I mind, of course, but some of the touchier girls might kick up a fuss if you called them that.
Elite? Yes. Military? Yeah. Strippers? No, usually that's just me.
Other way around, Jessie. Florence is more like an actual name, while PA-15 is my designation, based on this baby right here.
Hmm? Yeah. There's no problem if you want to call me Florence, I get it.
No, not really. I was designed and manufactured by a company called IOP, but it's not like I know each and every person involved with me.
Small world, am I right?

Hmm? Yeah, I've played before. There's some real high rollers at the base who'll suck you dry if you don't know what you're getting into... and by you, I mean your wallet.
Unfortunately.
I thought it'd be more exciting if I went easy on you for a bit, but I couldn't really get a streak going... what a buzzkill.
This is how long I could last picking the worst hands? Not quite the thrill I was looking for.
I got further than I was expecting playing awfully, but all good things must come to an end.
You could call playing to lose a cheap thrill, but I certainly enjoyed it.
My heart's been beating so hard for the last few rounds. You shouldn't get this far sabotaging your own hands.
It's so nerve-wracking picking out the worst hands each time. But beating the odds gives me such a rush...
I was starting to get worried that I'd run away with the game.
Thanks for keeping this game competitive. I was starting to think this'd be over before it started.
You're really running out of time to turn the tables on me...
It's really hard for me to make a comeback victory if I can't get in a losing position to begin with...
Way to really knock me down a peg. Don't worry, I know what you all want from me.
I hate having too much of a lead anyway. Let's even this up a little.
This case shouldn't play. You should submit a bug report.
Took you long enough to steal away another victory.
Y'know, I hate being the favorite to win anything.
I hoped you'd do it a lot earlier, but it looks like you've finally closed the gap.
Good job hanging in there for so long.
Oooh nooo, you got meee. Well, like I said, how about I up the ante for you all?
Alright, you got me. I'll uphold my end of the bargain.
Woah there, don't get too excited now. I'm not even close to getting fired up yet.
It's far too early to be getting excited... I don't hate your attitude, though.
Should I keep the tension up for a little longer?
If you thought this is where you'd finally get some real excitement, well, I hate to be the bearer of bad news...
This case shouldn't play. You should submit a bug report.
If you're waiting for me to make a big play, you might have to wait a little longer.
Sorry to say, but I'd like to keep your anticipation building for a little while longer.
You've seen me at my worst, but can you beat me at my best?
No more holding back. You better be ready for this.
I shouldn't do what I'm about to do in a position like this, but... things are definitely more fun this way.
A smarter idea here would be to pace myself, but where's the fun in that?
This game is still a little too close for my taste. How about you turn up the heat for me?
You're making some good progress. Keep this up, and we'll get to the real exciting parts soon enough.
I get it, you want to keep me on my toes.
If you keep pressuring me like this then I might have to start playing seriously.
This case shouldn't play. You should submit a bug report.
Keeping the pressure on me, aren't you all?
You really want to push me to my limits, huh?
You've all worked hard. I guess it's time to put my money where my mouth is.
I didn't think a card game would be pushing me to my limits, but here we are.

I see what you mean. It doesn't seem easy to go around hitting people with that stick of yours without attracting any attention, but you probably could knock someone out with it, even with your little noodle arms.
Ho~oh. Is that so? What a shame. There's a lot of fun in causing a little chaos.
Oh, so you were talking about those sort of explosions, huh? Well, I love those kinds of explosions too. Nothing beats working up towards a thrilling climax.
You... don't know what a receiver is? Do you know what a phone is? A radio?

state.text: A different name..? Okay, what about... oh, I know. How about I call you "Shimmy"?
Quick legs will only get you so far. You need a quick mind as well.
Big? Nope. It's just loose. I love the feeling of freedom you get from loose-fit clothing.
Well, that's easy. I thought it would be fun.
You don't seriously think you are a boat, do you?

case.state: You're a real stick-in-the-mud, aren't you? Believe me, I have more than enough experience to know how to handle a gun properly.
A "cult"? I don't know what crazy ideas you're getting about me, but I don't think that I am the gun at all.

Oh, believe me, there are times when I wished I had something with a little more firepower. But at this point, the PA-15 is like an extension of my own body, you know? It feels weird to go without it.
Yeah, you were. Didn't that just get your heart racing?
Too little, too late, pocket rocket.
Hey, I'm really good when I put my mind to it, pocket rocket. Even when it comes to losing.
I hope this won't be a sign of things to come. I'm expecting a real exciting race, after all.
Whaaat? Back to being all sullen again already? Don't be that way. I'd rather you keep barking than go back to whimpering.
Oh, don't worry, cutie. I'm just as comfortable with my gun as I am without.
You're a giant spider? That's an oddly specific example to use...
Skip the foreplay?
Oh, these good looks aren't a part of my current occupation, but my old job. Being a cute girl helps out in ways you can probably imagine.
Oh, so you like me, hmm? I didn't think you'd be the forward type, but I can't say I dislike girls who take initiative.
You "suppose"? Don't be shy, Megumin, you can admit you're liking what you see.
Why do people keep thinking I am the gun? I don't have anything to do with the gun itself, it's just the firearm I work best with.
You're a real interesting character, you know that, Amy?
Hey, hold on, slow down a bit! I can hardly keep up with what you're sayi-
...cape. I'm fine, but this bodysuit might just be done for.
The only threat I might have made today would have been threatening to take you out back for a little fun, cutie.
That's because soldiers don't have a sense of style, Saki. I'm a form over function kinda girl... and you have to admit, I've got one hell of a form to show off.
I can't tell if you're trying to be supportive or if you're getting mad at me here, Orendi.
Florence was my name when I was still an A-Doll. Turns out civilians prefer normal names over weird model numbers. Long story short, PA-15's kind of like my military ID.
Ha! Nope! I might be playing to win, but I'm definitely hoping to have a little fun along the way.
If you're not enjoying eating then you're not eating the right foods, Galatea. How about I make you my favourite dish, sriracha scrambled eggs?
As for strip poker? Well, I've definitely tried. The Commander doesn't exactly condone risque activities--
I don't go anywhere without my gun. At this point, it's like an extension of my own body.
You all beat me at my worst, so, a small reward for your small victory.
I'll take these gloves off, then. I know, I know, not very exciting.
Don't get too excited now. We haven't even gotten to the good part yet.
If you're getting excited over a jacket, you're going to have real trouble getting to the end of this game.
Okay. Maybe I just took off a bit more than I was expecting.
That wasn't supposed to happen. I hope I didn't break anything...
Alright, a freebie for you all.
Let's keep things interesting. You can have both of these this time.
The real fun will start soon enough, I promise.
Come on, show some patience. We'll get to the fun stuff later on.
Safety's off and one in the chamber. Just the way I like it.
Nothing left but victory now.
Not a fan of that either? Okay, back to pocket rocket it is.
You can't underestimate the processing power of a T-Doll. No matter what you do, I'll always be three steps ahead of you.

state.text: Hmm? What? I don't know what you're talking about.
Uh, maybe some other time, pocket rocket.

case.state: Alright cutie, whatever you say.
But, look, I get what you're saying, and I wouldn't want to worry that pretty little head of yours, so here: I'll empty the magazine and the chamber for you. Happy?
What, you think I named myself? See, this is why I said you could call me Florence instead...
You had your chance, cutie, and you blew it. I can't help it that you weren't ready to go up against me.
Oh, I'll be waiting, cutie. This was great fun.
That sounds an awful lot like an excuse, pocket rocket. Face it, you couldn't handle me.
Alright cutie, one - nil to me. You won't let me run away with this lead, will you?
Cutie.
I'm always glad to introduce cuties to new experiences... and if you think I look good now, just wait until the rest comes off.
What, are you backpedalling already? Relax, I'm not trying to threaten you or anything.
And I know it seems strange that I made it this far playing to lose, but what can I say? I can't help being good at the things I'm good at.
I bet you're the type of person who prefers the destination over the journey. You'll miss out on a lot of fun in life thinking like that.
Yeah, you have a good point, Amy. I much prefer my casual violence when there are some macho hunks involved.
Don't be too impressed now, cutie. Things are only going to get better from here.
...You're really all over the place, Amy... The bodysuit's custom made for my model, so, it's not the easiest thing to get your hands on.
If you thought I looked great with the bodysuit on, Amy, I bet you can't believe what you're seeing now.
The devil's in the details, Nami. If you're going to look good, everything should look good.
Let alone special forces, France doesn't have much of anything anymore. There's some pretty craters along where the Maginot used to be though.
What, not a fan? Come on, it beats being called "pee-aye" or "paa" all the time.
Hey, I don't mind. Fire away, Galatea.
I wouldn't exactly be an effective military android if I had an aversion to violence. Orders are orders, you know? If you say "shoot", I say "already done, what next?"

Try and guess how much I'm wearing underneath this. It shouldn't be that hard.
Not much left between you and the main event.

Let's get my excitement building higher and higher, okay?
Once you've had a taste of even bigger thrills, these things just don't do it for you anymore.
If you're trying to tease me, you're doing it wrong. You need to bring me to the edge before you start holding out on me...
You're going to really step it up in the next round, right?
This case shouldn't play. You should submit a bug report.
Now, let's get the rest off so you can come down here and have some real fun as well.
You just can't wait to join me, can you? I don't blame you.
Well, if you're that eager to join me, the invitiation's open, okay?

I'm starting to get close, ~name~. If you give me a little more, maybe you'll be the one to set me over the edge.
Don't ease up this pace, okay? I want to see the rest of you too.
At this rate, it won't be long before I'll need to go for a second round...

You won't stop here, right? Not when there's something even more exciting just around the corner?

state.text: Alright ~name~, let's get a good look at those chiseled abs of yours...

case.state: Here's your chance to impress me, ~name~. What have you got under ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ of yours...
Let's find out if ~name~ is hiding some real muscle under there...
A guy like you has got to have something nice in store for us, right, ~name~?

Whew, a body like that might even put Kryuger to shame.

state.text: It was a joke, ~name~. If you're feeling bad about it, you should change that.

case.state: I've seen T-Dolls with more muscles than you, ~name~. You should work out a bit more.

I'm not exactly impressed, but don't feel too bad about that. There's still plenty more of you to appreciate, ~name~.

state.text: Girls' chests should be cute and soft, but guys? Built like a tank, of course.
~Name~, I was hoping for more from you. I think I've probably got more muscle than you.
That's not a gun in your pocket now, is it?

case.state: Here's your opportunity to excite me, ~name~.
How about you show me what you've got, ~name~? I wanna see your everything.
Are you as excited as I am, ~name~? I think we're about to find out.

state.text: There's been plenty of time to build up some excitement. I'm hoping you've got a big payoff for us, ~name~.

case.state: You know we've all been waiting for this, right? You better be ready to satisfy us, ~name~.

state.text: All bark and no bite, huh?

case.state: Good luck getting anyone excited with that, let alone someone like me.

state.text: Weren't you listening, ~name~? I said I only wanted the biggest thrills.
All that buildup just for this? What a letdown.

case.state: Don't worry, cutie. Spend some time with me and I'll make that little guy grow up big and strong.

state.text: Yeah, okay. I like what I see.

case.state: I think you and me could have plenty of fun together, ~name~.

Oh, don't worry, ~name~, you're getting me real excited.

state.text: Now how did you smuggle in a weapon like that, ~name~?

case.state: I won't back down from any challenge, not even a monstrous one like that.

Alright princess, how about you get those flowers out of the way so we can get a better view of the cutie behind them?

state.text: Wait, that wasn't what I meant at all!
Well, you really don't see that every day...

case.state: I have no idea what you just did, but that gave me some serious chills.

state.text: Wow, look at you, ~name~. Where's all this confidence coming from, huh?

case.state: I'm sure a cutie like you has a cute pair to boot.

Oh, ~name~'s about to get serious? How exciting~

I bet you wanted to do this as much as we wanted to see this.

state.text: Is this the most people you've stripped off in front of? Or maybe... you're secretly a pro at this?

case.state: Oh? I was waiting for you to go all out. Now this game can really begin.

state.text: Well, it's definitely not coming from your chest, that's for sure.

case.state: See? I can tell you don't do this often... how does it feel? Feels great, doesn't it?

There's nothing wrong with being small and cute.

Don't tell me you seriously want to play this game again?
This whole time I thought you were just another kitten, but it looks like you were a lion this whole time. That's kinda awesome.
Hmm~ I see where your confidence is coming from. Not bad.

state.text: There you go! So, how does it feel? Isn't it refreshing?

case.state: Haha, a cute reaction, just like I expected.

state.text: Take it from me, ~name~. An average-sized chest has a lot more punch with enough confidence.

case.state: I don't think there's anything wrong with getting excited by cute girls.
Whew, impressive. No wonder you're so eager to strut your stuff!
Wow, look at those! You're really taking that whole "liberated" thing to its extreme, aren't you?

state.text: I bet you couldn't wait to bust out those guns, huh?

case.state: A sight like this'll get anyone excited!
I guess you don't need to puff out your chest when you're stacked like that.
You could have plenty of fun with those...
Ah, ma petite fleur, how kind of you to bloom for us!
What'll it be, ~name~? Are you starting to feel the heat?

state.text: Time to see if you're feeling as excited as I am right now.

case.state: Come on, ~name~, you know you're excited about stripping down in front of all these strangers.
I know a girl who's more excited than embarrassed when I see one.
Hey, don't knock it 'till you try it. Maybe you'll enjoy being naked in front of a crowd.
Oh? What kind of tricks will the little princess have up her sleeves?

state.text: Hey, have you ever thought about going commando? It's a kind of thrill you won't be able to live without once you've experienced it.

case.state: If you think this feels good, you should try going commando more often.

state.text: Isn't it nice to let loose like this? Try not to get addicted to this rush, okay?

case.state: There's no shame in admitting to enjoying this, ~name~. Freedom feels great after all!

state.text: Is "going fast" the only thing that ever runs through your brain, pocket rocket?

case.state: If you're ready, then let's get this show on the road.
*Yawn*. You know, Meia, you remind me of a much more boring version of... well... me.
Did someone forget to tell little miss pocket rocket here that you want to keep your clothes on in this game?
Hey, you better watch where you're pointing that gun of yours, cowgi-

state.text: Hello, miss silent-type. Are you going to scribble on your little notepad this whole time, or are we going to hear that pretty little voice of yours at some point?

case.state: Hey, I'm going to call you May-may, is that alright? Oh, I bet you're wondering where that name came from.
Y'know, May-may, I had you down for the brooding, gloomy type when I first saw you.
Oh, hmm... Erufuda, you said you were an... elf, right?
Hey now, easy there girl. We're here for a good time and a long time, so there's no need to be so eager.
So, Galatea, I was wondering... what's your deal, anyway?
Well, would you look at that. A male android, huh? You don't see that every day.
Oh, you know what? You remind me of those early transitional model A-Dolls, in a way.
Aww, jeez, one of you gloomy types, huh. I really can't handle people like you.
"Two-Hands", huh? Everybody in the business knows its not easy to pick up a nickname in our line of work.
Woah, what's up with those springy arms of yours, Ribbons? Can't say I've seen anything like those before.
Hey, Ribbons, I was thinking...
Why, hello there, big boy. What's your name?
Aw, jeez, did I let an Illumination Fairy follow me here from the base? The Commander's gonna kill me...
Didn't you say you were some kind of pilot, Jura? What's up with the sword?

Something tells me that it's going to be a while before I have to play seriously...
Hey, Moon, remember that time I asked you to tone it down a little?

state.text: What's wrong, cutie? Feeling a little inadequate? Don't tell me you're going to run--

case.state: Look who's finally back. Were you feeling a little lonely out there, Chihiro? Did you miss me?

case.state: Hey, SC. Could you tell me a little more about this "streaming" thing?

state.text: Why, hello there, mister big man with a big gun.

case.state: See? I told you that I'd strip you down myself, big man.

state.text: Quick question, pocket rocket. Is this exploding thing normal for you?

case.state: You don't actually think that your athleticism is helping you win this, do you?

state.text: Are you all planning to turn up the heat eventually? I'm feeling a little left out here.

case.state: That makes four. How far am I going to make it before someone shuts me down?
Are you trying to draw me in to a false sense of security here? I'm not feeling challenged at all.

state.text: T-Dolls sure are resilient, aren't they? We're made to not go down easily, after all.

case.state: Well then, I guess it's time for the real exciting part to start.
This is where the real fun begins.
Believe me, this is something you're going to enjoy.
Oh, trust me, ~name~, you're going to enjoy this.

Do I have advice for when things go badly? Well...
"Perfect plans" don't exist. Things will go wrong.
How do I go about salvaging a bad situation? Lemme think...
What can go wrong, will go wrong. What should you do when that happens?

state.text: If things aren't going your way, you need a plan.
I have plenty of tricks up my sleeve for a bad situation. Wanna hear one?

case.state: There's a reason we worry about when and not if things go wrong.
Sorry, ~name~, but I'm all out of worthwhile advice here.
You need a hand, ~player~? Want to borrow something of mine?
Hey, ~name~. I want to keep this close, so... you want some advice?
I can't have you losing like this too often, ~name~. Want a handicap? No? How about a tip?
I want the odds stacked against me, not you. How about I even them up a bit?

state.text: I like winning as much as the next T-Doll, but it's not fun if it's not close. Lemme help you out.
I don't want you losing too much before I can really get into the game, so here's a tip for you.

case.state: Look, ~name~, I won't be having any fun if you keep playing like this, so listen to what I'm about to tell you.

I'm going to need you to step up your game, ~name~. Luckily, I can help with that.

The thrill you get from dancing right on the edge just can't be beat.
I can't tell you how satisfying it is whenever I get a high card victory. You should all try it some time.
Unexpected victories taste the sweetest.
I thought that was going to be it for me.
I'll be fired up in no time if I keep cutting it close like that.
Looks like I wasn't even close, huh? Not a great look for me.
You've got to admit, I gave you a real good run for your money, didn't I?
Ah, what a nail-biter..! I might have lost, but I can't be mad about this result...

state.text: Wha~at, your top? Not going for the naked apron look?

case.state: State of the art, huh? Really? How so?
Like?

state.text: Wait, your combat clothes?

case.state: Ah, well, if it's a race you're after, I'd be happy to take you on.

state.text: Now now, there's no need to deny it. I know another exhibitionist when I see one.
Well, James, you can feel free to call me Florence.

case.state: Like, look at that! I'm hardly getting a rise out of you even when I'm insulting you right to your face!

case.state: I expected elves to be more, y'know, "stunning and elegant beauty".

Wonder why I've never seen a model like yours before... Are you an older model, or maybe an unreleased one?

state.text: Back then, they wanted more human looking androids, but still didn't really have the advanced AI needed to make them act human.

case.state: There are frigid people who wouldn't know what an emotion was even if it hit them like a 40mm, and then...
So, there's gotta be one heck of a story behind how that caught on, right?

Especially since it looks like this is as serious as little miss Moon over here is going to get.
No? Not interested? Okay, can't say I'm surprised.
The orange is a bit off theme, though. How do you like the color purple?

state.text: That thing looks like it'd hurt. Well, as much as a riding crop could hurt a military-grade android...

case.state: Wait, so you're telling me that there's an audiencealways watching everything you do?

state.text: I hope your huge rocket launcher isn't compensating for something else...

case.state: If you're going to stall and build up suspense like this, my expectations are only going to get higher, you know?
I hope you'll be ready for when things really start to heat up. This game might get a little hardcore for you.
Oh, uh, not that you don't look cute now. Just that you could look... uh... cuter, you know?
I might be a girl who likes slowly building up to a climax, but I can't say I dislike it when someone decides to get right into the action.
Mmm, I guess. Nothing I can't handle, though.
Wait a second... did you come to a strip poker game practically naked?
Oh, ~name~, are you about to join m- oh, I didn't see you still have your ~clothing~.
By my count, you must have, what, at least six things left on you?
I bet you think you're hot stuff with a lead like that, ~name~.
If you think that win was just luck, you're dead wrong, ~name~.
Jeez. You're really putting up a fight, huh?
You're really gonna make me work for this win, aren't you?
You might think you've got a big lead on me, but let's see how long that's going to last.
Wait, are you really good at this, or have I been really good at losing? Ah, whatever.
I'm sure at least someone here is happy to see you stripping down.
What, you think that's a safe enough lead over me?
What's wrong, ~name~? Feeling that lead of yours slip away?
What, did I catch you off guard? I told you to stay on your toes.
Didn't you know that "a cornered rat will bite the cat"?
~Name~... There's no need to go easy on me all of a sudden.
Let's keep things competitive, alright, ~name~? I hate easy wins.
What's wrong, ~name~? Why are you taking so long to finish me off?
Is your game plan falling apart, ~name~? Did you forget all my advice from earlier?
We're long past the point where I'm willing to give you any more freebies.
Carbon turns to diamond under pressure, but it looks like ~name~ just falls apart instead.
I'm a Griffon & Kryuger Tactical Doll... but since I'm off duty, let's sweep this defeat under the rug, okay?
Tactical Dolls are worker robots retooled for combat. Trust me, we're more competent than I make it sound.
I'm glad there are still places like this running. You wouldn't expect luxuries like this after the Beilan Incident.
Even amongst T-Dolls, my processing power is a cut above.
Above all else, I can take pride in my tactical flexibility.
I'll do any kind of mission. Anything at all.
Hmm? Playing around on the job? Yeah, I do it all the time.

state.text: Here, would it help if I stripped with you?
Tactical Dolls may be expert marksmen, but we've also been programmed with some of the world's finest combat techniques.
I'd love to have a hothead like you on my team, ~name~.

case.state: You're military, aren't you, ~name~? I can tell that you have experience on the battlefield.
Ah. I've spent enough time around a certain German rifle to know what kind of character you are.

state.text: Oh, ~name~, you're one of those people, huh? The boring kind.

case.state: Why don't you take more than just your ~clothing~ off? I promise I'll return the favor at some point.
~Clothing~? I know there's gotta be someone out there who gets all worked up about hands, but it's not really doing it for me.
I hear that some people find the nape really sexy. Maybe with your ~clothing~ out of the way we can get a better look.
With your ~clothing~ out of the way we can get a better look at your... head..? That's not exactly going to get anyone excited.
Some people think I'm an idiotic risk taker, but they don't know what's really going on.

state.text: How did you get in here wearing something like that, ~name~? It's a costume, right?

case.state: Do you normally go around wearing so little, ~name~?
T-Dolls are usually manufactured with pretty specific colors in mind.
You seem like the kind of person who goes around saving damsels in distress.
You seem a little out of your element, princess. Don't worry, thats a good thing.

state.text: Eugh, not another one of you serious-types.
What's wrong, ~name~? Not used to being in front of this many people?

case.state: Your belt might be in the way of the good stuff, but who says you can't take your pants off alongside it?
What's Griffon & Kryuger? It's a Private Military Company. Think of a highly trained, more organized mercenary band.
What was I doing before I was re-purposed for combat? Hehe, wouldn't you like to know?
You don't know what the Beilan Incident is? Ehh... it's a story that'll ruin the mood. Maybe some other time.
I can make the best possible move every time. I just prefer the more exciting ones.
Why worry about avoiding a bad situation? It's a greater thrill to fight your way out when it happens.
But make sure you leave the most exciting missions to me, okay?

state.text: Just kidding. T-Dolls are as professional as it gets.

case.state: Jeez, Commander, you're so forward when we're together at the base. Why are you so shy now?
You're always so daring at home, Commander. Where'd this coy side come from?
Aww, are you feeling shy, Commander? You're not like this when we're alone together.
Well, at least you look great enough for the both of us, pocket rocket.

state.text: Aww, don't lie. You were pretty worried for a little there, right?
I had a great time, pocket rocket. Let's do this again some time.

case.state: What, not interested? Come on, ~name~, you could ask for all sorts of things from me...
Sure, most of the world's been destroyed by this and that, but you're okay, so that means you can enjoy yourself a bit more, don't you think?
It's not like you have to deal with a rogue AI army, so why don't you get a little wild? Take off something else while you're at it?
I don't know what things are like in whatever post-war nation you come from, but in here, we're playing to enjoy ourselves.
Let's forget that most of the world is uninhabitable right now. Take a load off, ~name~. Oh, and take some more clothes off while you're at it.
Looking at you in person, you're about as cute as they described.
You seem a lot more masculine than I expected. At least you're as cute as they say.

state.text: Just kidding. You didn't think I'd make it that easy, did you?

case.state: T-Dolls at G&K get standard issue uniforms, you know? But surely you didn't need to bring all the extra bits and pieces, right?
I know I came in with some accessories on too, but it's all practical stuff -- standard issue T-Doll equipment.
All the little things are fine if you're on a land reclaimation mission, maybe, but we're playing strip poker here. Leave the junk at the door.
The planet's still a smouldering wreck. How do you have the luxury to have all that stuff on anyway?
I still don't get why people keep thinking I believe I am the gun. People clearly play way too many video games.
For a T-Doll, our imprinted firearm is like an extension of our body. Can't go too long without it, or else... well... you don't want to find out.
Turns out people prefer cute girls when it comes to civil service androids. I mean, look at me-- can you blame them?
Somewhere along the way, some genius thought people would treat us better if we were all cute girls. They were kind of right.
Sure, there are plenty of cute T-Dolls at G&K, but if I see them half dressed, they're probably in literal pieces and we're meeting in the repair bay.
One of the problems of being so damn good at our jobs is that there are really only T-Dolls fighting battles, and hardly any human staff.
Yeah, things might have been a lot simpler when I was in civilian industries as an A-Doll, but I get to do way more exciting things now.
